name: AMX Form Builder
tagline: AMX Form Builder is a web app that helps users create simple HTML forms with PHP backend using drag-n-drop.
body:
# AMX Form Builder
AMX Form Builder is a web app that helps users create simple HTML forms with PHP backend using drag-n-drop. The generated PHP files may be uploaded on any PHP-enabled web server. The submitted form data will be stored in a CSV file in the same directory as the php file.

## Author
Afaan Bilal (@AfaanBilal)  
[afaanbilal.github.io](https://afaanbilal.github.io)  
[Google+](https://google.com/+AfaanBilal)  

## Try it!
A fully-functional version is hosted at [GIT.CU.CC/form-builder](http://git.cu.cc/form-builder)

## Getting Results
The submitted data will be stored in a CSV file in the same directory as the php file with the same name as that of the form. The file may be opened in MS Excel easily or any text-editor.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
